name: Space Navigation
description:
This is my entry for Mini Jam 67: Void, Space Navigation

Controls : 

Left Mouse Button : Charge rocket ship while holding down, shoot when released

R : Restarts level

Space Navigation is a game where you navigate a rocket ship through space by sending the rocket ship into different planet's gravitational pull which alter the ships direction.

This is my first game jam I've ever participated in, and it was a fun experience! Was a little bit busy this weekend so I cut down on some features I wanted to add but I think it's still an alright idea for a game and acceptable execution.

Feel free to give any kind of feedback in the comments :)
